description:
The Snowcrew Anorak features Ventia 2L waterproof, breathable technology, providing storm-worthy protection for active use in rugged, demanding conditions. Built with VerticalX Eco, high-loft synthetic insulation made from 85% recycled content, it has a superior warmth-to-weight ratio, breathability, and moisture management, making it ideal for outdoor adventures.

The anorak also has a wire brim and Hood Lock for a custom fit, fully seam-taped construction, brushed tricot chin guard, multiple hood adjustments, and is Snowsports helmet-compatible. The Snowcrew Anorak's thoughtful design is perfect for resort skiing and snowboarding.
name: Outdoor Research Snowcrew Anorak - Mens

specs.value: bluesign® approved Ventia® 2L 100% Polyester (56% Recycled) 75D X 150D Plain Weave Mechanical Stretch
VerticalX Eco™ 100% Polyester (85% Recycled) Insulation 60 G
